author: anon-28836

ctx: Indijski poslovneži so nori na London
content:
Zadnja sprememba: anon-521 06.12.2006 15:20

Haris je
napisal(a):
sem pogledal tudi na www.thinklondon.com
 
evo, odgovor iz Think London (Marc Hardwick, Research Manager
)...

The £33m figure relates to the Gross Value added to the London
economy by the 850 people working for the 36 Indian companies
assisted by Think London and not the flow of FDI which you can
expect to be much greater particularly when Mergers and
acquisitions are taken into consideration

po mojem gre za njihovo propagando in (namerno) napacen opis
situacije... skratka, indijske FDI so bistveno visje, tole je
navaden bullshit (ki ga je, mimogrede, popapal tudi BBC)
